articles.author: Compiled by Herman Mostert
articles.title: SA athlete Stephen Mokoka breaks 50km world record - News24
articles.description: South African athlete Stephen Mokoka has set the 50km men's world record in a road race in Gqeberha.
articles.content:
• SA athlete Stephen Mokoka has broken the world 50km record.
  • Mokoka won in a time of 2:40:13 at a road race in Gqeberha.
  • He broke the record of 2:42:07 that was held by Ethiopi… [+2111 chars]

articles.title: Covid-19: South Africa records 1 735 new infections and 26 deaths - News24
articles.description: South Africa has recorded 1 735 new Covid-19 infections, which represents a 5.8% positivity rate. The National Institute for Communicable Diseases says 26 new Covid-19-related deaths have also been recorded.
articles.content:
• South Africa recorded 1 735 new Covid-19 cases on Saturday.
  • 26 new deaths have been reported, bringing the confirmed death toll to 99 543.
